page.title: 16CHURCHES _ CLEE HILL AREA
page.content: There are 3{Church of England} churches in our area. The church on Clee Hill is{St. Peter's,}and was built in 1881. The church services are every Sunday at 10_00am, except for the 3rd. Sunday in the month. The same vicar takes the services at Clee Hill and Knowbury. The church at Knowbury is called{ {St. Paul's.}The service is at 11-00am, and is on the 3rd. Sunday in every month. Church meetings are held alternately at Knowbury and Clee Hill. Many different things are done to raise money for the churches, such as Fetes, Coffee Evenings, Cheese and Wine Parties, Bingo and 50/50 sales. Hope Bagot church is called{St. {John's.}The 1st. Sunday in the month is Holy Communion at 8_30am; and the 3rd. Sunday is Evensong at 3_30pm. The vicar comes from Burford Rectory.
